reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Supporting the Republic of Senegal with preventive medical equipment and supplies to confront the emerging corona virus (Covid-19) within the group of 26 countries

description.narrative: Providing preventive medical supplies at the Ministry of Health in Senegal to confront the emerging coronavirus, COVID-19
Reducing the spread of the emerging corona virus (COVID-19), supporting the health sector in confronting the Corona virus, and strengthening health services in combating its spread

The steadfastness and continuity of the health sector in providing curative and preventive services to (1,630,000 beneficiaries) of health sector workers and citizens, educating citizens in dealing with the pandemic, taking preventive precautions and limiting its spread of the Corona virus.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
